channel.title: Courses on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Boettiger Group

item.description: Embedded versions of my summary sheets for the Population Biology graduate group core course, organized by faculty member’s section. Schreiber: Single species population dynamics Schoener: multispecies population dynamics Stachowicz: Community ecology Sih: Animal behavior Turelli: Population genetics and speciation Wainwright: macroevolution and comparative phylogenetics
